title: [CHUCK] Add deployment health checks
body:
## Description

Implement health check endpoints for all services to enable better monitoring and automated deployment verification.

## Requirements
- Add /health endpoint to web app
- Add /health endpoint to mobile API
- Check database connectivity
- Check Redis connectivity
- Check external service connectivity

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Health endpoint returns 200 OK when all systems operational
- [ ] Health endpoint returns 503 Service Unavailable when systems down
- [ ] Response includes status of each dependency
- [ ] Endpoint is monitored by uptime service
- [ ] Documentation updated

title: [TUCKER] Write E2E tests for pet profile creation
body:
## Description

Create comprehensive E2E tests for the pet profile creation flow to ensure reliability.

## Test Cases
1. Happy path - create profile with all fields
2. Required fields validation
3. Image upload
4. Multiple pets per user
5. Edit existing profile
6. Delete profile

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All test cases implemented
- [ ] Tests pass consistently
- [ ] Tests run in CI pipeline
- [ ] Test coverage > 80%

title: [SAMANTHA] Audit authentication security
body:
## Description

Perform comprehensive security audit of authentication flow including email confirmation.

## Scope
- Review JWT implementation
- Check session management
- Verify password hashing
- Test email confirmation flow
- Check for common vulnerabilities (CSRF, XSS, SQL injection)
- Review rate limiting

## Deliverables
- Security audit report
- List of vulnerabilities (if any)
- Recommended fixes
- Implementation of critical fixes

title: [LARRY] Improve error logging for API endpoints
body:
## Description

Enhance error logging to include more context for debugging production issues.

## Requirements
- Add request ID to all logs
- Include user ID (when authenticated)
- Log full error stack traces
- Add structured logging
- Integrate with error tracking service (e.g., Sentry)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Request ID in all log entries
- [ ] Error tracking integrated
- [ ] Log levels properly set
- [ ] Documentation updated

title: [MAYA] Implement offline mode for mobile app
body:
## Description

Add offline support so users can view pet data without internet connection.

## Requirements
- Cache pet profiles locally
- Cache recent activity
- Queue actions when offline
- Sync when connection restored
- Show offline indicator

## Technical Approach
- Use React Native AsyncStorage
- Implement sync queue
- Add network status monitoring

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Users can view cached data offline
- [ ] Changes sync when online
- [ ] Clear offline indicator shown
- [ ] Tests cover offline scenarios

title: [ANA] Create dashboard for user engagement metrics
body:
## Description

Build analytics dashboard to track user engagement and app usage.

## Metrics to Track
- Daily active users (DAU)
- Weekly active users (WAU)
- Monthly active users (MAU)
- Feature usage
- User retention
- Churn rate

## Deliverables
- Dashboard with visualizations
- Automated daily reports
- Alert system for anomalies

## Tools
- Use existing analytics setup
- Integrate with monitoring system

title: [BUCK] Optimize database queries for pet listings
body:
## Description

Optimize slow database queries identified in production monitoring.

## Issues
- Pet listing query takes 2-3 seconds
- N+1 query problem on user profiles
- Missing indexes on frequently queried columns

## Tasks
- [ ] Add indexes to pet table
- [ ] Optimize JOIN queries
- [ ] Add query result caching
- [ ] Test with production-scale data

## Target
- Reduce query time to < 200ms
- Improve page load time by 50%

title: [THOMAS] Update API documentation for v2 endpoints
body:
## Description

API documentation is outdated and missing new v2 endpoints.

## Tasks
- [ ] Document all v2 endpoints
- [ ] Add request/response examples
- [ ] Document authentication
- [ ] Add error codes reference
- [ ] Update OpenAPI spec
- [ ] Generate interactive docs

## Audience
- External developers
- Frontend team
- Mobile team

title: [DEXTER] Redesign onboarding flow
body:
## Description

Current onboarding has 60% drop-off rate. Redesign for better UX.

## Goals
- Reduce steps from 5 to 3
- Add progress indicator
- Improve mobile experience
- Add skip option for optional fields

## Deliverables
- [ ] User flow diagrams
- [ ] Wireframes
- [ ] High-fidelity mockups
- [ ] Prototype for testing
- [ ] Accessibility review

title: [PETER] Define MVP requirements for medication reminders
body:
## Description

Define requirements for medication reminder feature (top user request).

## Research
- [ ] User interviews (5-10 pet owners)
- [ ] Competitive analysis
- [ ] Technical feasibility
- [ ] Legal/compliance review

## Deliverables
- [ ] PRD (Product Requirements Document)
- [ ] User stories with acceptance criteria
- [ ] Priority ranking
- [ ] Success metrics
- [ ] Launch timeline

## Stakeholders
- Engrid (implementation)
- Maya (mobile)
- Samantha (compliance)
- Tucker (testing)

title: [ISABEL] Set up production monitoring and alerting
body:
## Description

Production environment lacks proper monitoring. Set up comprehensive observability.

## Components
- Application performance monitoring (APM)
- Infrastructure monitoring
- Log aggregation
- Error tracking
- Uptime monitoring
- Alert routing

## Tools
- Datadog or New Relic for APM
- CloudWatch for infrastructure
- Sentry for errors
- PagerDuty for alerts

## Deliverables
- [ ] Monitoring dashboards
- [ ] Alert rules configured
- [ ] On-call rotation setup
- [ ] Runbook documentation

title: [AXEL] Design REST API v3 with GraphQL migration path
body:
## Description

Plan next generation API with better performance and flexibility.

## Goals
- Reduce API calls for mobile app
- Add real-time capabilities
- Improve error handling
- Better versioning strategy

## Considerations
- GraphQL vs REST
- Backwards compatibility
- Migration strategy
- Performance requirements

## Deliverables
- [ ] API design document
- [ ] OpenAPI/GraphQL schema
- [ ] Migration plan
- [ ] Performance benchmarks

title: [ENGRID] Refactor authentication module for better testability
body:
## Description

Authentication code is tightly coupled and hard to test. Refactor for better architecture.

## Issues
- No dependency injection
- Hard to mock external services
- Low test coverage (45%)
- Complex logic in controllers

## Approach
- Extract business logic to services
- Add dependency injection
- Create interfaces for external deps
- Write comprehensive unit tests

## Target
- Test coverage > 85%
- All logic testable in isolation
- No breaking changes to API

title: [CASEY] Create customer onboarding checklist
body:
## Description

New customers struggle to get started. Create guided onboarding experience.

## Components
- Welcome email sequence
- In-app checklist
- Tutorial videos
- Help center articles
- Live chat support

## Success Metrics
- Reduce time to first pet profile created
- Increase feature adoption
- Reduce support tickets
- Improve user satisfaction (NPS)

## Deliverables
- [ ] Onboarding checklist design
- [ ] Email templates
- [ ] Help articles
- [ ] Tutorial videos
- [ ] In-app guidance
